name: Hercules Pillars
how_to_perform:
# Hercules Pillars
1. Stand on the ground with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a set of dumbbells or weights in each hand.
2. Engage your core and maintain good posture by keeping your shoulders back, chest out, and spine straight.

Holding onto the end of the dumbbell/weight bar, perform an overhead shoulder press:
 Perform a strict, vertical extension movement with your arms fully extending the weight directly upwards.
 Briefly pause at the top of the extension to target your serratus anterior muscles & upper trapezius muscles in both your shoulders. 

Then, return the dumbbells/weights back to their starting position under control slowly lowering it downwards, keeping your elbows slightly bent.

Repeat this motion rapidly at a steady pace. Ensure proper form and technique while maintaining constant blood flow.
short_summary: Hercules Pillars is a dynamic strength and cardio exercise that targets multiple body parts using dumbbells/weights.
